trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_SEQ_00<tab>Managingway is thinking it may be time to suit up.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with Protectingway in Bestways Burrow.
TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested items to Managingway.
TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Protectingway in Bestways Burrow.

TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_MANAGINGWAY_000_001<tab>Ah, just the person I was looking for. Another bright-eyed dreamer has come to me seeking help─Protectingway.

TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_MANAGINGWAY_000_002<tab>Her dream is to see that all Loporrit-kind enjoy a long and healthy life abrim with safety. At present, she's hard at work on an invention to protect us from parasitic fungal spores─and the infectious diseases they can induce. Nasty stuff.

TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_MANAGINGWAY_000_003<tab>The moon's surface is full of all sorts of perils─inhale even one stray spore and we could find ourselves with a runny nose, rashes all over, or heavens, even loss of fur! If she can find some way to prevent such travesties from occurring, I for one would welcome it.
TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_MANAGINGWAY_000_004<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Do you have a moment to spare? Protectingway has requested your aid once again.
TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_MANAGINGWAY_000_005<tab>It seems her invention─the parasital infection protection suit, or PIPS for short─works, and now she wishes to bolster its production.

TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_MANAGINGWAY_000_006<tab>For the sake of all Loporrits present and─well, present, I ask that you meet her in Bestways Burrow, and assist her with the production of this invaluable device.
TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_PROTECTINGWAY_000_007<tab>Ah, hello there! I take it Managingway sent you here to assist me. Your help is much appreciated!

TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_PROTECTINGWAY_000_008<tab>As Managingway undoubtedly informed you, I'm constructing a suit designed to shield the wearer from infectious spores. Unfortunately, I'm short on deft paws able to craft the most essential components─or rather I was, until you came.

TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_PROTECTINGWAY_000_009<tab>It would be wonderful if you could use these spare metal parts to craft a fastener for the suit to ensure it stays airtight! Should you run out of materials, I'm just a hop, skip, and a jump away!

TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_PROTECTINGWAY_000_010<tab>It would be wonderful if you could craft an airtight fabric for the suit─can't have it letting in the stray fungal matter, after all! Should you run out of materials, I'm just a hop, skip, and a jump away!

TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_PROTECTINGWAY_000_011<tab>It would be wonderful if you could craft an adhesive to ensure the suit remains airtight! Should you run out of materials, I'm just a hop, skip, and a jump away!

TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_PROTECTINGWAY_000_012<tab>When you've finished, please take the component to Managingway. I wish to implement it into the suit straightaway upon my return to the machining station!
TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_PROTECTINGWAY_000_013<tab>What's that? You've run out of materials? But... I clearly see you holding them right there!
TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_PROTECTINGWAY_000_014<tab>What's that? You've run out of materials? But... I clearly see you holding them right there!
TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_PROTECTINGWAY_000_015<tab>What's that? You've run out of materials? But... I clearly see you holding them right there!
TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_PROTECTINGWAY_000_016<tab>Run out of materials, have you? Not to worry, I've plenty more here.
TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_PROTECTINGWAY_000_017<tab>Run out of materials, have you? Not to worry, I've plenty more here.
TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_PROTECTINGWAY_000_018<tab>Run out of materials, have you? Not to worry, I've plenty more here.
TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_MANAGINGWAY_000_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! How do matters fare with Protectingway?

TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_MANAGINGWAY_000_021<tab>Ah, I see you've already crafted the necessary material. If it were anyone else, I would be inclined to put this through several inspections─but I know we're in good paws with you. Protectingway will doubtless be thrilled.

TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_MANAGINGWAY_000_022<tab>Still, I wonder why she thought to create a protective suit. Rather than address a symptom of the problem, would it not be more effective to attack its source, and eradicate the infectious fungi in the first place?
TEXT_BANLOP112_04698_MANAGINGWAY_000_023<tab>Well, it is not for me to question the dream of another. My thanks for your kind assistance!
